participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, with a love for storytelling and a sense of humor.
participant_1.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i have a son who is in junior high school.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and competitive, with a passion for sports and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i am a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.
